name: Updraft (Wesley Chun)
description:
This project was a coding challenge for the class MI 231 at Michigan State University, taught by Jeremy Bond. I worked on this project with another student Sebastian Garda. 

WASD to move and Space to use the Boost.

Glide around the world and hit air currents to regain altitude, try and stay in the air as long as possible!

(Assets provided by Peter Burroughs)
